Class Renderer_Impl

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.render.Renderer_Impl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer

    public class Renderer_Impl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderer
    Renders the game's content.

      • FOCUS_AREA_SIZE

        private static final int FOCUS_AREA_SIZE
        The size when the board, rather than being displayed completely, is only shown when overlapping with the focus area. This also determines the size of said focus area.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROUNDING_COMPENSATION

        private static final int ROUNDING_COMPENSATION
        A 'magic number' used to compensate for properties of default Java rounding.

    • Method Detail

      • drawSquare

        private void drawSquare(java.awt.Graphics graphics,
                        java.awt.Point location,
                        java.awt.Point offset,
                        java.awt.Color color,
                        int cellSize,
                        int scale)
        Draws an rectangle of the specified colour in the stated location.
        Parameters:
        graphics - the Graphics item to draw with
        location - the location of the item to draw
        offset - the amount to modify the location by, based on the sizing of the board
        color - the colour to draw the square in
        cellSize - the size of a cell; should be the same as others
        scale - how many cells the square should encompass

      • drawIcon

        private boolean drawIcon(java.awt.Graphics graphics,
                         java.awt.Point location,
                         java.awt.Point offset,
                         java.awt.Image image,
                         int cellSize,
                         int scale)
        Draws an individual item or tile, represented using the specified image in the stated location.
        Parameters:
        graphics - the Graphics item to draw with
        location - the location of the item to draw
        offset - the amount to modify the location by, based on the sizing of the board
        image - the image to draw
        cellSize - the size of a cell; should be the same as others
        scale - how many cells the image should encompass
        Returns:
        false if the image pixels are still changing; true otherwise

      • inBounds

        private boolean inBounds(java.awt.Point location,
                         java.awt.Point min,
                         java.awt.Point max)
        Determines whether an object is within some bounds, specified by a minimum and maximum point.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the object
        min - a Point containing the minimum x and y values
        max - a Point containing the maximum x and y * values
        Returns:
        a boolean representing the object's location relative to the specified bounds

        Description copied from interface: Renderer
        Sets the board layout to be rendered. A null state disables all rendering.

      • setFocusArea

        public boolean setFocusArea(java.awt.Rectangle area)
        Description copied from interface: Renderer
        Changes the focus area (displayed region) of the board. Until resetFocusArea() is called, this also disables automatic adjustment of it. The Rectangle comprising the new area must have a width and height of 9.
        Specified by:
        setFocusArea in interface Renderer
        Parameters:
        area - the new focus region
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the focus region was changed

      • resetFocusArea

        public void resetFocusArea()
        Description copied from interface: Renderer
        Resets the focus area to its default value, enabling automatic adjustment of it.
        Specified by:
        resetFocusArea in interface Renderer

      • getFocusArea

        public java.awt.Rectangle getFocusArea()
        Description copied from interface: Renderer
        Retrieves the current focus area (displayed region) of the board. Should setFocusArea() not be called, this is computed by the last call of redraw().
        Specified by:
        getFocusArea in interface Renderer
        Returns:
        the current focus area as a Rectangle.

      • getCellSize

        public int getCellSize()
        Description copied from interface: Renderer
        Retrieves the cell size as rendered by the last call of redraw(). If redraw() has not been called, -1 is returned.
        Specified by:
        getCellSize in interface Renderer
        Returns:
        the size of tiles drawn as an int.

      • getRenderedItems

        public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Object> getRenderedItems()
        Description copied from interface: Renderer

        Specified by:
        getRenderedItems in interface Renderer
        Returns:
